ContributeToConservation.title: Do we contribute for conservation?
ContributeToConservation.description: Of course, when you agree to choose HIVOOC's tour service, it means that you have agreed to join HIVOOC in contributing an amount of 100,000 VND/person/tour to conservation projects. This contribution amount is decided by HIVOOC and allocated to implement different conservation projects/activities in Son Tra Peninsula to help reserve its forest and wildlife.

SellingPoint.title: Immersive travel that is culturally respectful and environmentally sensitive.
SellingPoint.description: HiVOOC specializes in designing trips that integrate biodiversity and cultural diversity. Each destination offers travelers a unique natural beauty, featuring distinctive flora and fauna, as well as rich cultural elements—from cuisine, architecture, and historical sites to the local names of various species.

SpeciesPage.heroSubtitle: Tailor-made wildlife experiences that bring you closer to nature's most extraordinary moments
SpeciesPage.introDescription: From forest canopies to hidden wetlands, Vietnam shelters extraordinary primates, birds, reptiles, amphibians, and countless insects. Browse our growing library of species and filter by group to plan the encounters you care about most.
SpeciesPage.emptyState: No species match the selected filters.

Introduction.title: Your date. Your destination. Our planning and Expertise.
Introduction.description: HIVOOC specializes in designing trips that integrate biodiversity and cultural diversity. Each destination offers travelers a unique natural beauty, featuring distinctive flora and fauna, as well as rich cultural elements—from cuisine, architecture, and historical sites to the local names of various species.

Unique.title: What make us unique
Unique.description: HiVOOC specializes in designing trips that integrate biodiversity and cultural diversity. Each destination offers travelers a unique natural beauty, featuring distinctive flora and fauna, as well as rich cultural elements—from cuisine, architecture, and historical sites to the local names of various species.

feature1.title: UNFORGETTABLE WILDLIFE ENCOUNTERS
feature1.description: Journey into the wild with us and discover rare species that most people never get to see. Your adventure into the unknown starts here.

feature2.title: FIELD EXPERTS
feature2.description: Embark on the wildlife tour with professionals in the field of ecotourism, biology, and conservation who will help you deepen insights into Vietnam's unmatched biodiversity and our efforts to maintain such ethereal wonders.

feature3.title: RESPONSIBLE AND SUSTAINABLE TOURISM
feature3.description: We focus on eco-conscious tour operations ensuring every journey is in perfect harmony with nature and committed to long-term sustainability.

feature4.title: CONTRIBUTIONS TO LOCAL COMMUNITIES
feature4.description: A portion of our tour's revenue will be brought to support the local conservation communities whose reckless efforts were of importance to preserve the serene scenery and magnificent wildlife.

WhatToExpect.title: What you can expected
WhatToExpect.description: Every journey is crafted to match your interests, pace, and wildlife dreams. No two experiences are the same.

expect1.title: SUSTAINBLE JOURNEYS
expect1.description: Immerse yourself in wildlife trips destined for conservation and sustainability of nature and the local community.

expect2.title: DEDICATED LOCAL GUIDES
expect2.description: Get to know and stick with our passionate local guides who have deep connections with the wilderness you will explore.

expect3.title: YOUR OWN MAGICAL MEMORIES
expect3.description: Be astonished by exclusive wildlife observation, epic natural landscapes, and cultural heritage that together constitute unforgettable stories of your own.

Testimonials.text: The wildlife experience exceeded all expectations. Our guide's knowledge was incredible, and we saw species I never dreamed I'd encounter in the wild
Testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell, Wildlife Photographer

Hero.title: Our Story
Hero.description: Tailor-made wildlife experiences that bring you closer to nature's most extraordinary moments

Story.title: HiVOOC Story
Story.description: HiVOOC specializes in designing trips that integrate biodiversity and cultural diversity. Each destination offers travelers a unique natural beauty, featuring distinctive flora and fauna, as well as rich cultural elements—from cuisine, architecture, and historical sites to the local names of various species.

Founder.title: Meet Our Founder
Founder.paragraph1: Founded by a passionate wildlife conservationist and experienced tour operator, HiVOOC represents years of dedication to protecting Vietnam's precious wildlife heritage.
Founder.paragraph2: With a background in environmental science and sustainable tourism, our founder recognized the urgent need to create travel experiences that benefit both wildlife and local communities. This vision led to the establishment of HiVOOC as a leader in responsible wildlife tourism.
Founder.quote: I believe that every traveler can become a conservation champion. Through meaningful wildlife encounters and authentic cultural experiences, we can inspire a global movement to protect our planet's biodiversity.

members.name: Bùi Văn Tuấn (Tuấn Ba Gấu)
members.title: CO-FOUNDER - CEO
members.description: Mr. Bùi Văn Tuấn, commonly known as “Tuấn Vọc,” “Tuấn Ba Gấu” is a primate conservation expert. Born in 1986, he has dedicated over 15 years to researching and safeguarding rare primate species, particularly the brown-cheeked and gray-cheeked langurs in Central Vietnam. Even as a university student, his passion for langurs inspired him to embark on daring field trips—from sleeping in the forest to meticulously studying their behavior and natural habitat.

members.name: Lê Trang
members.title: CO-FOUNDER - CONSERVATION EDUCATOR
members.description: Mr. Bùi Văn Tuấn, commonly known as “Tuấn Vọc,” “Tuấn Ba Gấu” is a primate conservation expert. Born in 1986, he has dedicated over 15 years to researching and safeguarding rare primate species, particularly the brown-cheeked and gray-cheeked langurs in Central Vietnam. Even as a university student, his passion for langurs inspired him to embark on daring field trips—from sleeping in the forest to meticulously studying their behavior and natural habitat.

members.name: Thùy Vân
members.title: CO-FOUNDER
members.description: Finance Manager, who ensures the financial matters of HiVOOC. Transparency, dedication and ensuring the financial safety of HiVOOC and all customers.

members.name: Dr. Tilo Nadler
paragraphs: Dr. Tilo Nadler stands as a pivotal figure in conservation within Vietnam, widely known and respected for his unwavering dedication to primates and forest ecosystems.

His remarkable life has become a source of inspiration for anyone fortunate enough to encounter him. His devotion to the old-growth forests of Vietnam has earned him the esteemed title of 'knight of the old forests of Vietnam,' a testament to his extensive conservation efforts that extend beyond the realm of primate research and protection.

The affectionate moniker bestowed upon him by the Vietnamese people, 'Primate Lord,' carries profound significance, reflecting his central role in the preservation of the country's rare primate species. This title, translating to 'lord of the primates' or 'king of the primates', is not merely a name but a recognition of his vast knowledge, leadership in primate conservation endeavors, and likely the significant successes he has achieved in safeguarding these vulnerable animals. The use of this honorific highlights the deep admiration and respect held by the conservation community and the Vietnamese people for his contributions.

Tilo Nadler's extensive experience and knowledge have made him a valuable advisor to government agencies and businesses on conservation issues. His advice has been instrumental in shaping our mission: Ecotourism for Conservation and Conservation for Ecotourism.

SellingPoints.title: Ecotourism For Conservation & Conservation For Ecotourism
SellingPoints.intro: At HiVOOC, the motto 'Ecotourism for Conservation and Conservation for Ecotourism' isn't just something we say - it's the foundation of everything we do. With every wildlife tour, we actively implement practical conservation projects, ensuring that your trip is not only a memorable experience but also contributes to the protection of nature.
SellingPoints.cta: How can we put it to action?

investment.title: Direct Investment in Conservation
investment.description: A portion of proceeds from each tour will be dedicated to conservation projects, from supporting primate protection patrols, training for local trackers...

experiential.title: Experiential Ecotourism
experiential.description: We carefully design our experiential ecotours to minimize negative impacts on the environment. We adhere to responsible wildlife viewing guidelines and encourage guests to participate in small conservation activities, such as litter picking or tree planting.

community.title: Community Partnerships
community.description: We believe that conservation is only successful with the involvement of local communities. We create employment opportunities, support sustainable economic development, and raise awareness about the value of nature. We work with communities to develop community-based tourism models, ensuring that they directly benefit from conservation.

education.title: Conservation Education
education.description: We integrate conservation education into every tour, helping visitors better understand the importance of ecosystems, animals and the challenges they face. Through talks, interactive activities and live guidance from experts, we empower visitors to become conservation ambassadors. We also organize free experiential education programs for families and children every month, to spread the love of nature and the spirit of conservation.

SellingPoints.quote: We believe that by actively and responsibly combining ecotourism with conservation, we can protect the untamed beauty of nature for future generations.
